item.title: Crypto Raised More Money in the First Two Quarters of this Year than All of Last Year.
item.description: With a friendly administration and $13 billion already invested in 2025, cryptocurrency is booming—but critics warn the next crash may be far worse.

item.title: Jury Orders Tesla to Pay More Than $240 Million in Autopilot Crash Case
item.description: The federal jury held that Tesla bore significant responsibility because its technology failed.

item.title: 3 Things to Know Before You Invest In Public Relations
I Worked in the Building Where 4 People Were Killed. Here’s How to Make Your Building More Secure
item.description: A security expert offers a list of ‘must-haves’ for workplace safety that may save lives in the event of a mass shooting.
